abstrac: I am an mechatronics engineer with more than 7 years of engineering background. I have professionally helped more than 500 different customers to deliver their product on the market
bio:
I am professional certified mechatronics engineers with proved knowledge and experience working with many different, mold makers, architects, jewelers, car and ship designers, inventors, electrical and mechanical engineers. 3d cad cam is what I do on daily basis.

Just provide me with your explanation what you want to achieve. Through my carrier I have helped more than 80 companies or individuals to finalize their ideas and inventions. I own several patents and designs also That's why  I am able to deliver full spectrum of services to finalize your ideas or maybe just improve them a bit, to give your ideas competitive edge. 
 I own my own co2 laser(which I built by myself) , cnc machine and 3d printers (photopolymer and fdm) Also have access to 3d scanners fiber and galvanometer lasers, plasma cutters, water jet .... . With these machines at home I can prototype your product very fast, test in real life and provide you with scientific result and measurements, with numerous, power, frequency, radio frequency, speed and sound measuring devices  

After prototyping I can deliver for you finished solution for mass manufacturing, I will design your product in a such manner that it will be easier to get started with manufacturing. I have hand son experience, with bottle mold making, multi axes mold with moving and sliding part (with hot runner and cold runner designs), multi part injection molding, extrusion, co2 and fiber laser cutting, cnc machining, lathe milling, wire and sink edm processes, ultrasonic plastic and metal welding.

You might wonder how one person can know so many machines, just ask me for proof of anything above and I will provide it.

Currently I am able to deliver 30 hours of work per week, payment can be done through guru.com. Communication can be done via phone, video calls, or just text messages through guru.com. I always prefer to have at least one video online chat to achieve mutual understanding in shorter timeframe. With good understanding of the subject together we will be able to achieve our goals faster and in better quality.

description.title: Litigation Paralegal
description: $30/hr   ·   Starting at $25

Litigation Paralegal with two decades of knowledge in the legal field. I can help with: 
- Pre-Litigation: Handling Bodily Injury Claims, including Motor Vehicle Accidents and Slip and Fall cases.
 -

abstrac: With two decades of experience in the legal field, including more than six years as a personal injury paralegal, I offer a wealth of knowledge and expertise to support your law practice.
bio:
One of my greatest pleasures is poring over medical records. I find analyzing and summarizing medical records to be one of the most crucial aspects of personal injury cases.

In my previous role as a Paralegal and Case Manager at a Plaintiff firm, I had the opportunity to handle over thirty cases, from minor to major injuries, and helped secure significant compensation for our clients. I specialize in pre-litigation cases, where insurance companies often settle for fair compensation.

Whether you're a seasoned lawyer or starting a new practice, my expertise and years of experience will be an asset to your team. I am excited to offer my Paralegal Services to your firm, and I am confident that I have the skills and experience necessary to make a meaningful contribution to your team.

bio: I love life and everything life has to offer. I have strong values of respect, kindness, compassion, and patience, and I am motivated to help others in any way. For years I have been helping friends, family, and people in the community through writing resumes, editing and proofreading work, and tutoring English. My work is of a very high standard, and I have been told by many people that I could do this for a living. So I'm giving it a go. I hold a Bachelor of Arts in modern history with an English literature minor, and am currently doing a Masters. I look forward to working with you!

Hours are flexible, and deadlines will be agreed before the project has started. Payment is preferred by PayPal or bank transfer on completion of the project, or in the case of ongoing work, on a weekly or fortnightly basis. Communication is preferred here, or via email at amyhong@live.com.au - I strive to reply within 24 hours.

description.title: Creative and original Illustrator
description: $20/hr   ·   Starting at $100

I can offer a wide array of capable and skillfully done artwork for almost any genre.  I am capable of working in any medium including photoshop, illustrator, and have a working knowledge of InDesign.…

abstrac: If you're look for something imaginative, original and skillfully executed, I am your artist.
bio: I was a self taught artist until college where I often wished I had remained a self taught artist but, as with most things, it all worked out for the best.  I love traditional art and most of my work starts with the traditional tools, pencil and paper, pen and ink etc.  Afterwards I'll take the sketch and work it up in a digital environment like photoshop or illustrator depending on the project. A huge amount of my illustrative life was spent in the world of underground comics, zines (gone and mostly forgotten), printmaking and eventually the world video games where I did a good amount of concept art for characters and backgrounds.  Currently live in the Texas hill country where I pursue my art down all of the wild and varied roads it takes me.
Rush projects are not encouraged.  A twenty percent good faith payment (applied to total) required.  Please contact via e-mail with project details.

abstrac: I'm an idea magnet, creationist, and weaver of tales.
bio: If the story of your life isn't worth telling once you've lived it, what was the point? I've been coloring mine with unforgettable memories and experiences for the better part of the last 20 years and those experiences have given me an inexhaustible amount of ideas that I draw from. I've worked in Television as a creative and played the part of Headshot Photographer for actors and models over the course of more than a decade. When not occupied by any of that I've managed to craft several screenplays, stage plays, novels, and short stories. Tell me your idea and let's create with character.

I work afternoons, evenings, and weekends. Mornings cost extra. I'll work seven days a week with no problem: just let me know your timeline. I prefer to speak with people but if email is all you have access to we'll make it happen. Prompt payment is a necessity.
